Company: Florida State University, Florida Department of Education
Description of incident: The information of 47,000 Florida teachers was publicly accessible for 14 days after a data transfer at Florida State University.  The information was from teachers participating in state prep programs.  The Department of Education used Florida State University as the contractor for the transfer of teacher data.UPDATE (06/26/2013): People who participated in Florida teacher preparation programs during the 2009 -2010 and 2011-2012 academic years were affected.
